text: tara byatita yara emana lokadera sathe yoga-sajasa kare yadera madhye o tomadera madhye angikara rayeche, athaba yara tomadera kache ase yadera hrdaya sankucita hayeche tomadera sange yud'dha karate athaba tadera lokadera sange lara'i karate. Ara yadi allah iccha karatena tabe tini tomadera upare tadera baliyana karatena, tara phale tara niscaya'i tomadera sange yud'dha karato. Kaje'i yadi tara tomadera theke sare yaya o tomadera sange yud'dha na kare, baranca tomadera prati santi cukti pesa kare tahale tadera birud'dhe kono patha dharabara jan'ya allah tomadera niyukta karena ni.
